thread.title: Hollywood Production Center: Evening of Art and Music, Kingdom Season 2
thread.title_full: Hollywood Production Center: Evening of Art and Music, Kingdom Season 2

title: Hollywood Production Center: Evening of Art and Music, Kingdom Season 2
text:
October 13, 2015 11:00 ET Hollywood Production Center: Evening of Art and Music, Kingdom Season 2 
Kingdom Returns for Round 2 of High Drama and Smashing MMA Thrills 
LOS ANGELES, CA--(Marketwired - Oct 13, 2015) - Hollywood Production Center is excited to tune into the season two premiere of the DirecTV original series Kingdom on October 14 at 9:00 pm. Created by Byron Balasco and airing exclusively on Audience, Kingdom is a family drama set against the gritty world of Mixed Martial Arts (MMA) in Venice, California, and revolves around Alvey Kulina (Frank Grillo) who owns and runs Navy St. Gym with his girlfriend, Lisa (Kiele Sanchez). Season two finds Alvey's fortunes have led to a bigger gym but also a bigger appetite for risk. Ryan "The Destroyer" Wheeler (Matt Lauria) defends his title, while Alvey's son Jay (Jonathan Tucker) finds a new obsession. Lisa (Kiele Sanchez) focuses on managing Alicia (Natalie Martinez), an impulsive but skilled female fighter. Meanwhile, Alvey's other son Nate (Nick Jonas) is determined to get back in the cage, which is causing a rift with the family. And Christina (Joanna Going) gets a taste of sober life while carrying the burden of her sons' struggles -- with victory comes agony and a price. 
Debut Art Exhibition Featuring Edgar Harutyunyan 
The Hollywood Production Center is grateful to have such amazing tenants. To show their appreciation, they're excited to host Revive -- a debut art exhibition featuring select pieces and sculptures from artist Edgar Harutyunyan. The exhibit will be held in the beautiful patio setting at their Glendale location on East Broadway on October 15th from 6:00-11:00 pm. Guests have the opportunity to enjoy light music, wine, refreshments, and, of course, the unique artwork of Edgar Harutyunyan. Harutyunyan's work is billed as a unique revival of old and abandoned objects in their newfound art forms. 
About Hollywood Production Center 
The Hollywood Production Center, with four locations in the heart of Hollywood and downtown Glendale, offers professionals and entertainment industries in southern California top-rated facilities for immediate occupancy of production, post-production, Hollywood office space, creative and filming space, and recording studios. Hollywood Production Center's office facilities are home to executives, writers, recording-artists, and anyone needing short-term to permanent Hollywood office space. Additionally, HPC's Glendale rooftop facilities are available for corporate, small-business, and private events of all kinds, offering beautifully appointed patios for rooftop events throughout the year -- from mixers and wrap parties to grand openings.
